word:
Since my first acquaintance with you, I have felt an intense interest that you should see the King in His beauty, behold the earth made new, and be eternally saved in the kingdom of God. My brother, Jesus is a complete Saviour, and I desire His joy to be in you, that your joy may be full.-- Letter 49, 1894. (Written August 3, 1894, from Norfolk Villa, N. S. W.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 1, 1984
